collectible.title: Blue Chaos Emerald
collectible.subtitle: Very beautiful. Very powerful.
collectible.text: One of seven jewels of immense magical power, this particular Chaos Emerald was in Rouge's possession before the Space Colony ARK incident. If she knew you had it, Rouge would do almost anything to get her hands on it again...

collectible.title: Treasure Scope
collectible.subtitle: I spy with my little eye...
collectible.text: This high-tech lens allows the wearer to detect objects that would normally be hidden from view. It has served Rouge well on many a mission.
collectible.unlock: Once Rouge loses the game, give her enough time to steal all the treasure she can.
